import React, { useState } from "react"; import "../../styles.cinemas_page.css"; import { Heart, ChevronDown, User, Filter, Info, Play } from "lucide-react"; export default function CinemaPage() { const [selectedDate, setSelectedDate] = useState("14 APR"); const [selectedLocation, setSelectedLocation] = useState( "KLANG VALLEY - 1 UTAMA" ); const [locationDropdownOpen, setLocationDropdownOpen] = useState(false); const dates = [ { day: "TODAY", date: "14 APR" }, { day: "TUE", date: "15 APR" }, { day: "WED", date: "16 APR" }, { day: "THU", date: "17 APR" }, { day: "FRI", date: "18 APR" }, { day: "SAT", date: "19 APR" }, { day: "SUN", date: "20 APR" }, { day: "SAT", date: "26 APR" }, { day: "SUN", date: "27 APR" }, { day: "SAT", date: "3 MAY" }, ]; const locations = [ "1 UTAMA", "1 SHAMELIN", "AMPANG POINT", "AU2 SETIAWANGSA", "BUKIT RAJA", "BUKIT TINGGI", "CENTRAL I-CITY", "CHERAS SELATAN", "CHERAS SENTRAL", "DPULZE CYBERJAYA", "PAVILION BUKIT JALIL", "STRAND KOTA DAMANSARA", "JAYA SEKSYEN 14", "KEPONG", "MINES", "RAWANG", "SETIAWALK PUCHONG", "SUNWAY PUTRA", ]; const movies = [ { id: 1, title: "BLOOD BROTHERS: BARA NAGA", image: "/placeholder.svg?height=200&width=150", details: "Action, Drama | 2 hr 9 mins | Bahasa Melayu", showtimes: [ { type: "INDULGE", times: ["8:00 PM"] }, { type: "BEANIE", times: ["8:45 PM"] }, { type: "DELUXE", times: ["6:45 PM", "7:00 PM", "9:30 PM", "9:45 PM", "10:35 PM"], }, ], }, { id: 2, title: "GOOD BAD UGLY (TAMIL)", image: "/placeholder.svg?height=200&width=150", details: "Action, Drama | 2 hr 20 mins | Tamil", showtimes: [ { type: "INDULGE", times: ["9:00 PM"] }, { type: "DELUXE", times: ["8:00 PM", "10:15 PM"] }, ], }, ]; const experienceTypes = [ { id: "all", label: "ALL" }, { id: "indulge", label: "INDULGE" }, { id: "indulge-family", label: "INDULGE FAMILY PLUS" }, { id: "imax", label: "IMAX" }, { id: "beanie", label: "BEANIE" }, { id: "junior", label: "JUNIOR" }, { id: "family", label: "FAMILY" }, { id: "atmos", label: "ATMOS" }, { id: "infinity", label: "INFINITY" }, { id: "onyx", label: "ONYX" }, ]; const [selectedExperience, setSelectedExperience] = useState("all"); return (
